item.title: Steps to set up a hugo blog
item.description: In the very first post, I am just going to document the steps which I followed to set up this personal blog. 1. Install hugo brew install hugo 2. Create a new hugo site/project hugo new site blog 3. Initialize git for source control cd blog git init 4. Add the desired theme as a git submodule git submodule add https://github.com/digitalcraftsman/hugo-cactus-theme.git themes/hugo-cactus-theme; git submodule init To pull the latest changes from the remote repo
